item.title: Home 35
item.dc:creator: phamlam
item.content:encoded:
Itâ€™s time for better coffee Order your powerful Coffee Machine now! Just signup with your email to get noticed Discover Now

How it works

Insert

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore

Press the button

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore

Enjoy!

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore

Taste is everything

Relax and take in the smell of freshly ground coffee as you rise in the morning.Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore

Your favourite Coffee machines

Perfectly designed from the inside out with a state of the art burr grinder surrounded by a strong but lightweight stainless steel casing.Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum
dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur.

Unique experience

Brew a pot of coffee just the way you like it and keep it warm all day.Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore

Stay connected with app

Remote brew fresh coffee from anywhere in the house, directly from your smartphone.
  • Caccusantium doloremque laudantium.
  • Totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa quae ab illo inventore.
  • Veritatis et quasi architecto beatae vitae.

Ready when you are...

Brew a pot of coffee just the way you like it and keep it warm all day.Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore

Specifications

  • Wireless 802.11 b/g/n
  • WPA/WPA2
  • Requires 2.4ghz router
  • 220-240V~ 50/60Hz
  • 900-1050W

What's in the box?

  • Coffee Maker machine
  • 3 sets colour panels
  • Glass Carafe
  • Instruction manual

Get 10% off your first order

10% off is a limited-time offer for
first-time customers purchased. Order Now
